Text.Language: Picaji de n~te P[oic efe~aiai ouoh efe~a~sai (ouoh) efe~a~mahi ouoh efe~tajro qen ]a~gia n~ekk~l/cia n~te V]: a~m/n.
The word of the Lord shall grow, multiply, be mighty, and be confirmed in the holy Church of God. Amen.
